g.title: IMDB_movie_connections
g.text: This graph shows connections between movies,
bold titles = IMDB Top 250, grey = TV series.

a.xlink:title: D: Harry O. Hoyt, rank 30 (IMDB: 7.1) "The first film adaptation of Sir Arthur Conan Doyle's classic novel about a land where prehistoric creatures still roam."
D: Clyde Bruckman, rank 47 (IMDB: 8.4 #120) "When Union spies steal an engineer's beloved locomotive, he pursues it single handedly and straight through enemy lines."

g.title: Chang: A Drama of the Wilderness (1927)

a.xlink:title: D: Merian C. Cooper, rank 23 (IMDB: 7.4) "Elephants disrupt the lives of a family deep in the jungles of Northern Siam, and an entire village."
a.text: Chang: A Drama of the Wilderness (1927)

a.xlink:title: D: Larry Semon, rank 37 (IMDB: 5.3) "A Toymaker tells a bizarre story about how the Land of Oz was ruled by Prince Kynd, but he was overthrown by Prime Minister Kruel..."

g.title: His Majesty, the Scarecrow of Oz (1914)

a.xlink:title: D: L. Frank Baum, rank 50 (IMDB: 6.0) "A wicked king has taken over the Emerald City, and wants his daughter, Princess Gloria to marry the horrid courtier Googly-Goo..."
a.text: His Majesty, the Scarecrow of Oz (1914)

g.title: The Wizard of Oz (1925)->His Majesty, the Scarecrow of Oz (1914)

a.xlink:title: D: Fritz Lang, rank 6 (IMDB: 8.4 #95) "In a futuristic city sharply divided between the working class and the city planners, the son of the city's mastermind falls in love with a working class prophet who predicts the coming of a savior to mediate their differences."
D: Giovanni Pastrone, rank 3 (IMDB: 6.6) "Three centuries before Christus. Young Cabiria is kidnapped by some pirates during one eruption of the Etna..."
D: Sergei M. Eisenstein, rank 28 (IMDB: 8.1) "A dramatized account of a great Russian naval mutiny and a resulting street demonstration which brought on a police massacre."
D: George A. Romero, rank 36 (IMDB: 8.0) "A group of people hide from bloodthirsty zombies in a farmhouse."

D: Alfred Hitchcock, rank 4 (IMDB: 8.7 #24) "A young woman steals $40,000 from her employer's client, and subsequently encounters a young motel proprietor too long under the domination of his mother."

D: Roman Polanski, rank 27 (IMDB: 8.1 #225) "A young couple move into a new apartment, only to be surrounded by peculiar neighbors and occurrences. When the wife becomes mysteriously pregnant, paranoia over the safety of her unborn child begins controlling her life."

g.title: Il buono, il brutto, il cattivo. (1966)

a.xlink:title: D: Sergio Leone, rank 43 (IMDB: 9.0 #4) "A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery."
a.text: Il buono, il brutto, il cattivo. (1966)

g.title: Il buono, il brutto, il cattivo. (1966)->The General (1926)

a.xlink:title: D: Marc Daniels, rank 7 (IMDB: 8.6) "Capt. Kirk and the crew of the Starship Enterprise explore space and defend the United Federation of Planets."
D: Alfred Hitchcock, rank 13 (IMDB: 8.1) "A young woman discovers her visiting "Uncle Charlie" may not be the man he seems to be."
D: Orson Welles, rank 22 (IMDB: 8.3 #122) "Stark, perverse story of murder, kidnapping, and police corruption in Mexican border town."
D: Stanley Kubrick, rank 10 (IMDB: 8.4 #86) "Mankind finds a mysterious, obviously artificial, artifact buried on the moon and, with the intelligent computer HAL, sets off on a quest."
D: Merian C. Cooper, rank 5 (IMDB: 8.0 #244) "A film crew goes to a tropical island for an exotic location shoot and discovers a colossal giant gorilla who takes a shine to their female blonde star."

g.title: King Kong (1933)->Chang: A Drama of the Wilderness (1927)

a.xlink:title: D: James Whale, rank 32 (IMDB: 8.0) "Horror classic in which an obsessed scientist assembles a living being from parts of exhumed corpses."
D: James Parrott, rank 41 (IMDB: 4.6) "Thelma and Patsy find themselves in a spooky house inhabited by a nut who is a mechanical genius and has made a robot who does everything..."

g.title: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs (1937)

a.xlink:title: D: William Cottrell, rank 9 (IMDB: 7.9) "Snow White, pursued by a jealous queen, hides with the Dwarfs; the queen feeds her a poison apple, but Prince Charming awakens her with a kiss."
a.text: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs (1937)

a.xlink:title: D: J. Searle Dawley, rank 15 (IMDB: 6.4) "Snow White, a beautiful girl, is despised by a wicked queen who tries to destroy her. With the aid of dwarves in the woods..."

g.title: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs (1937)->Snow White (1916/I)

a.xlink:title: D: Victor Fleming, rank 17 (IMDB: 8.2 #151) "American classic in which a manipulative woman and a roguish man carry on a turbulent love affair in the American south during the Civil War and Reconstruction."
D: D.W. Griffith, rank 12 (IMDB: 7.1) "The Civil War divides friends and destroys families, but that's nothing compared to the anarchy in the black-ruled South after the war."

g.title: Gone with the Wind (1939)->The Birth of a Nation (1915)

a.xlink:title: D: Victor Fleming, rank 1 (IMDB: 8.3 #121) "Dorothy Gale is swept away to a magical land in a tornado and embarks on a quest to see the Wizard who can help her return home."

g.title: The Wizard of Oz (1939)->The Wizard of Oz (1925)
The Wizard of Oz (1939)->The Tin Man (1935)
The Wizard of Oz (1939)->Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs (1937)

a.xlink:title: D: Maurice Tourneur, rank 40 (IMDB: 6.9) "Gwen's family is rich, but her parents ignore her and most of the servants push her around, so she is lonely and unhappy..."

g.title: The Wizard of Oz (1939)->The Poor Little Rich Girl (1917)

a.xlink:title: D: Jean Renoir, rank 34 (IMDB: 8.2) "During the First World War, two French soldiers are captured and imprisoned in a German POW camp. Several escape attempts follow until they are sent to a seemingly impenetrable fortress which seems impossible to escape from."
D: Ernst Lubitsch, rank 18 (IMDB: 7.6) "The small kingdom of Marshovia has a little problem. The main tax-payer, the wealthy widow Sonia (who..."
D: William Friedkin, rank 24 (IMDB: 8.1 #201) "When a teenager is possessed by a mysterious entity, her mother seeks the help of two priests to save her daughter."
D: Michael Curtiz, rank 8 (IMDB: 8.8 #16) "Set in unoccupied Africa during the early days of World War II: An American expatriate meets a former lover, with unforeseen complications."

D: Steven Spielberg, rank 14 (IMDB: 8.3 #112) "When a gigantic great white shark begins to menace the small island community of Amity, a police chief, a marine scientist and grizzled fisherman set out to stop it."
D: John Ford, rank 19 (IMDB: 8.1) "As a Civil War veteran spends years searching for a young niece captured by Indians, his motivation becomes increasingly questionable."

D: Alfred Hitchcock, rank 20 (IMDB: 8.6 #43) "A San Francisco detective suffering from acrophobia investigates the strange activities of an old friend's wife, all the while becoming dangerously obsessed with her."

D: Stanley Kubrick, rank 31 (IMDB: 8.5 #52) "In future Britain, charismatic delinquent Alex DeLarge is jailed and volunteers for an experimental aversion therapy developed by the government in an effort to solve society's crime problem... but not all goes to plan."

g.title: A Clockwork Orange (1971)->2001: A Space Odyssey (1968)

a.xlink:title: D: Stanley Donen, rank 45 (IMDB: 8.4 #77) "A silent film production company and cast make a difficult transition to sound."

g.title: A Clockwork Orange (1971)->Singin' in the Rain (1952)

a.xlink:title: D: Francis Ford Coppola, rank 16 (IMDB: 8.6 #37) "During the on-going Vietnam War, Captain Willard is sent on a dangerous mission into Cambodia to assassinate a renegade Green Beret who has set himself up as a God among a local tribe."

g.title: Apocalypse Now (1979)->The Birth of a Nation (1915)

a.xlink:title: D: Martin Scorsese, rank 42 (IMDB: 8.6 #41) "A mentally unstable Vietnam war veteran works as nighttime taxi driver in a city whose perceived decadence and sleaze feeds his urge to violently lash out, attempting to save a teenage prostitute in the process."
D: Francis Ford Coppola, rank 11 (IMDB: 9.2 #2) "The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son."
D: George Lucas, rank 38 (IMDB: 6.8) "Set in the 25th century, the story centers around a man and a woman who rebel against their rigidly controlled society."
D: George Lucas, rank 2 (IMDB: 8.8 #14) "Luke Skywalker leaves his home planet, teams up with other rebels, and tries to save Princess Leia from the evil clutches of Darth Vader."

g.title: Star Wars (1977)->Il buono, il brutto, il cattivo. (1966)
Shadow of a Doubt (1943)->The Merry Widow (1934)

a.xlink:title: D: Orson Welles, rank 25 (IMDB: 8.6 #36) "Following the death of a publishing tycoon, news reporters scramble to discover the meaning of his final utterance."
D: D.W. Griffith, rank 44 (IMDB: 6.6) "Drunken red Indians carouse in pagan revelry, whipping up their appetite for dog meat. In search of supper..."

g.title: The Birth of a Nation (1915)->The Battle at Elderbush Gulch (1913)

a.xlink:title: D: Steven Spielberg, rank 35 (IMDB: 8.7 #22) "Archeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the US government to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis."

g.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark (1981)->The Wizard of Oz (1939)
Raiders of the Lost Ark (1981)->Star Wars (1977)
Raiders of the Lost Ark (1981)->Citizen Kane (1941)
Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back (1980)

a.xlink:title: D: Irvin Kershner, rank 29 (IMDB: 8.8 #11) "While Luke takes advanced Jedi training from Yoda, his friends are relentlessly pursued by Darth Vader as part of his plan to capture Luke."
a.text: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back (1980)

g.title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back (1980)->THX 1138 (1971)

a.xlink:title: D: Ivan Reitman, rank 48 (IMDB: 7.8) "Three unemployed parapsychology professors set up shop as a unique ghost removal service."
D: James Cameron, rank 26 (IMDB: 8.1 #167) "A human-looking, apparently unstoppable cyborg is sent from the future to kill Sarah Connor; Kyle Reese is sent to stop it."
D: Steven Spielberg, rank 39 (IMDB: 7.9) "A group of Earth children help a stranded alien botanist return home."

g.title: E.T.: The Extra-Terrestrial (1982)->The Wizard of Oz (1939)
E.T.: The Extra-Terrestrial (1982)->Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back (1980)
